website_summaries.verdict: A drain cleaner that works fast and delivers proven results.
pros: Includes a non-splash formula that ensures the cleaner can remove fats, grease, lint, and other debris
Commercial-strength cleaner is biodegradable and offers a safe alternative to acid-based products
Delivers terrific results on clogs in bathroom and kitchen sinks
cons: Does not work on clogs caused by plastics, paper, and food particles

customer_reviews.title: Proselytizing drain opener?!
customer_reviews.text: Yikes! The bottle says "Jesus Love You!" Household products and religion are not a good mix. If a company wants to promote its religion, there's a proper place for that. I'd like to know what I'm buying into before I buy things!
customer_reviews.author: Jane G

customer_reviews.title: Very effective (if you follow directions)
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how well this worked. I've used it 3 times now (over a long period of time). The first time, I followed the directions exactly (left overnight and poured very hot water down the drain in the morning [had to heat up water on stove before pouring down shower drain]). It was great. The second time, I didn't do the hot water thing and it wasn't that great. So the third time I went back to following it exactly and the drain is perfectly clear. So the hot water thing is actually an important detail.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn from SATX

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: I had zero expectations. I was hoping for something that will hopefully open the drain blockage in couples uses because that's how bad the situation was and i was thinking if it is safe for the pipes probably it won't be strong enough to unclog. My upstairs neighbor broke our pipes with draino so i was afraid of doing the same thing. I qimed for half but ended up pouring 2/3 of the bottle down the bath tub and the remaining down the sink. I waited 12 hours and poured 1L of boiled water down on both and my drains are like brand new. I am so happy that i'll stock up on this product.
customer_reviews.author: B.S

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been dealing with a slow drain for months. I’ve tried everything on the market and also tried baking soda and vinegar. Nothing worked. My drain then became completely clogged. That’s when I found Xion. I was hopeful, but had my doubts. I followed the directions and only used about 16 ounces of the drain cleaner. I let it sit overnight. When I tried it in the morning, the drain was completely clear! This has been the only thing that worked to clear my drain.
customer_reviews.author: yogifromnc

customer_reviews.title: Unreal Results!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is no joke. This really works. My bathtub was so clogged that I could completely fill it with water for a bath without every plugging the drain - no exaggeration. I tried other non toxic products to unclog it with no success. I poured half of it down the drain but I waited for 24 hours before flushing it with hot water. I was so skeptical about the ability to unclog my tub, I even used boiling water from the stove. Well, I don't think the drain has ever worked this well -- even when I first moved into this place.
customer_reviews.author: Sublime

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review. Xionlab responded and they are crediting my account and sending me 2 free bottles. I appreciate their customer service. I have unfortunately resorted to drano so will update again when I have this problem again. Very slow draining shower with septic tank. Didn't work at all. Used the whole bottle and let it sit. For 24hours. No improvement. I've recently had foot surgery so don't want incisions in dirty water. Now still going to have to cover with a bag. Guess I'm. Going to have to resort to draino. Wish I could get my Money back but I've used it all.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Meriwether

customer_reviews.title: Actually worked after second treatment when many other products failed altogether.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in a paper box without any protective wrapping enclosing the product and the top of the container was damaged, with some leakage of the contents. Nevertheless, I used it in my almost totally clogged kitchen sink that would not unclog even after numerous treatments with other products. The first attempt with this product also failed to do anything as I let the product only sit for a couple of hours. The second time I let the product sit for 8 hours before flushing it out and it amazingly worked but it still took several minutes of careful flushing with hot water before the clog really cleared.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Truthteller

customer_reviews.title: Worked with ONE treatment
customer_reviews.text: Years ago my drain clogged up and I used something natural from the store. So this time, I looked on Amazon for something similar. The last time I remember it took two treatments and then the clog was removed. I bought two bottles thinking it would take more, just in case to have it. But, I have more for next time, this worked in one night. I do believe the directions helped, following with HOT water the morning after I feel really helped. I'll use this again and now I know it's just hair and stuff, not a bigger plumbing problem.
customer_reviews.author: The Dancing Chicken

customer_reviews.title: I'd love to make this a 5-star review, but no cap
customer_reviews.text: I'd love to make this a 5-star review, but no cap. The very first line of the instructions says to Ensure cap is secured and invert ... Others have complained about this too. This is too dangerous of a product to take chances like this. The cap was not just off the bottle, it wasn't in the packaging, which was also a poor choice for a dangerous chemical -- a bubble envelope!
customer_reviews.author: MartyytraM

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, it didn't work for us. We had a clog in our kitchen sink, after plunging it several times, using vinegar and baking soda a few times we bought Xion Drain Opener. Followed the directions, let it sit in the drain for 8 1/2 hours before flushing it with hot water - no improvement. Did it again as the instructions suggest and still no improvement. Here's hoping they make good on their refund. I had to snake the drain, which did work - eventually.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: did not work in my shower
customer_reviews.text: We have a slow draining shower. the reviews for this product enticed me to give it a try. Followed directions precisely. Used half the bottle and allowed to sit in drain all day, flushed with hot water. The next day we saw no improvement and repeated the process letting it sit in the drain overnight, then poured down copious amounts of hot water. Our shower fills as we use it, especially if both the shower and body sprays are on. I guess it might be time to call a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Blabbernackle

customer_reviews.title: The most useless and harmful clog remover that I have ever seen in my entire life
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most useless and harmful clog remover that I have ever seen in my entire life. Not only did it not work but it also made my drain much worse. The drain flow of my bathtub was slow and I wanted to improve it that is why I purchased this. I used it according to its directions but not only did it not work but it also completely clogged my drain and no water goes to the drain anymore. If it was a normal time and I had time I sure would sue this company. Not recommended even to my sworn enemy. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Abtin

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised - Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! My bathroom sink was taking about two minutes to drain after washing hands. I applied the drain opener as instructed before going to bed. In the morning I poured 5 cups of boiling water down the drain. That didn't seem to drain any faster (the instructions said a second application may be required). 30 Minutes later I applied a second 5 cups of boiling water and the sink drained a little faster. I then filled the sink to the overflow with hot water from the tap. After a few seconds the water began to drain so fast I had a 'mini-tornado' spiraling down the drain - completely open and free running. I'm Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Glen Ihrig

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it does work.
customer_reviews.text: I had a slow drain and then it finally stopped draining. For 3 days i had water in the tub and would not drain. so i ordered this. I followed the directions to a tee and after 8 hours, waa-laa, it finally went down. I poured half of the drain cleaner followed by 8 quarts of boiling water and now its clear as a bell. I will always use this to clean my drain, its worth the price to me. I have used Drano and other name brands and they are just so so. I thank you for a grear product.
customer_reviews.author: margaret egan

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this drain cleaner with the highest hopes for its capacity to clear clogs in sink and tub drains. However, the results were extremely poor. Both drains remain in practically the same clogged condition after use according to the instructions. And I am extremely disappointed with this product, especially given its expensive price. I would not recommend this drain cleaner to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: it worked
customer_reviews.text: I thought at first it did not work. I used a half bottle and left it overnight and the very slow bathtub drain seemed unchanged. I did the same thing the next night, and it seemed unchanged the next day. But on the third day, though I did nothing more, the drain was open and operating normally. I guess it took awhile to work through the gook. I haven't had anything done to the drain in the 15 years I've lived in my home and it probably had buildup. I'm happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer, 4X over
customer_reviews.text: Have employed XionLab three time now in a proactive manner; reflexively staying ahead of any kitchen or shower issues. The former is especially key, by virtue of the fact there's no garbage disposal beneath my kitchen sink. Yes, it's far more costly than Zep, or the other mainstays sold at HomeDepot. But the results have proved nothing less than cost effective. It also appears to be less toxic than most drain treatments. Given the results, plus the organic makeup of XionLab, I'll certainly be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Digregorio

customer_reviews.title: Drano or Liquid Plumbr did not work, but...
customer_reviews.text: XIONLAB Safer Drain Clog Remover DID work. I used 1/2 bottle the first night (bathroom sink) and let it sit for 7 hours before poring boiling water in sink. This seemed to nudge it a bit. Before I went to bed, I poured rest of bottle in and let it sit over night, then in the morning poured boiling water in and that seemed to do the trick. Has been about a month now and drain is still draining well. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G. Puls

customer_reviews.title: It worked!!!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions on the bottle and that were so kindly emailed by the seller. Poured. Almost half of the bottle down our VERY stinky and clogged bathtub drain in the evening (which drain did nothing to assist). Waited til the next morning and poured a coffee pot full of water down the drain. Not a problem since and the sewage smell is gone too! I gave the rest to my mom to try on her bathroom sink that is always SLOW to drain! I plan on keeping a bottle on hand always.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: This product is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect too much from any drain clog remover products but this one is different. I poured it into our clogged bath tub and forgot to run the hot waters for 2 days. So I eventually run the hot water. The drain didn't work for 2-3 minutes, but then I heard sound from the drainer indicating that something was opened up. And it did! All of sudden the clog in my bath tub was removed. We saved lots of money by choosing this product and not calling a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: Vika White

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a home that was built in the 50s, upon moving in we noticed our laundry drain was not working, seems like a clog at the bottom where is curves into concrete but I really don’t know for sure.. I used 2 doses, one for 10 hrs then again for 12hrs and there is no change to my drain and I still have a hard time getting through with a snake. Guess I’ll try something else, trying to avoid thousands of dollars to replace the pipes..
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to unclog my bathroom sink after purchasing another popular product that also didn't work and this didn't work either!!! It was as if i had simply poured thick, clumpy water down my clogged drain. I followed the directions on the label exactly to the letter and I literally saw NO MOVEMENT at all. The drain didn't even burp or bubble up. This product was a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Bev W.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I used exactly as directed and didn't work. I use half the bottle, let sit all night, used super hot water and it didn't get any better. I did the same steps again after reading other's success stories saying it took the entire bottle and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Simpuhl

customer_reviews.title: It has good reviews.....did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I filled the instructions and did 1/2 bottle for 4 hrs. No change in bathroom sink clog. Then did the other half over night. Still clogged in the morning. Got drano max and it was cleared in 25 minutes. This stuff said it was better than name brand stuff. Not in my case Returned for refund
customer_reviews.author: M. Natter

customer_reviews.title: Clogged Drain Remover
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact it is safe for pipes and septic system. Our upstairs and downstairs bathroom sinks very slow draining and lower finally stopped draining completely due to hair buildup. Poured product (approx 16 oz) into each sink at bedtime and let sit overnight. Poured boiling water down drain next morning. Both drains now completely clear fast draining. I recommend based on my experience with this product.
customer_reviews.author: brooksr47

customer_reviews.title: LIKE MAGIC
customer_reviews.text: I tried two gallons on Drano Max Gel. Two containers of Calcium Lime Rust removal. A box of baking soda and a gallon of vinegar. Nothing was working. XIONLAB Safer Drain Clog Remover was going to be my last resort before I called a plumber. I put 2 bottles of XIONLAB Safer Drain Clog Remover in my double sink. After 12 hours, I poured pots full of scolding hot water down both sinks. Less than ten minutes later... I was shocked, grateful, and more than satisfied XIONLAB Safer Drain Clog Remover WORKED. WORKED. WORKED. Ordering two more bottles just to keep on hand if I ever have a problem again. XIONLAB Safer Drain Clog Remover is now my go-to.
customer_reviews.author: Uriah

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described: Easy, Clean, Thorough
customer_reviews.text: Most-used bathroom sink in the house was starting to drain very slowly (causing water to start filling the sink). It seemed like too much icky work to try to clear the drain of hair, etc manually. I used this product as directed, and it managed to totally increase the drain flow. Problem solved. Although it's a concentrated formula, and you still have to be cautious with it, there is no harsh odor, and it's super easy to work with. Did not in any way damage my old PVC pipes, nor my little chromed plastic sink stopper that I couldn't remove during this drain treatment. Truly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ranthem

customer_reviews.title: Made it far far worse
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. In fact, made it worse. I had a sort of slow drain to begin with, which in the past has been easily cleared by a quarter small bottle of draino, but this time when I used the entire bottle of this new product, it made the drain stop completely. It’s just clogged with NO draining now. I’ve NEVER had that & I’ve lived in this house for 7 years. I bought a second bottle of this new stuff even before trying the first (which was my stupidity, all in the name of a better alternative to harmful chemical drain cleaners) but I guess I’ll give it another try. I have zero hopes though
customer_reviews.author: Nabeela Aijaz

customer_reviews.title: surprised at how well this works
customer_reviews.text: the directions sound like you have to be very exacting, but really you just pour the stuff in, wait a while (overnight if possible but not necessary in my experience) then pour boiling water in it. I just used a tea kettle to boil water and that amount of water was fine. I live in an old brownstone so lots of plumbing problems and clogged sinks... this has made my life easier. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JAR

customer_reviews.title: Did the Trick!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have used this product successfully. The first was on a clogged shower drain and this time on a slow draining sink. The product performed as promised both times. I received Fast delivery, of an effective product and great customer support. The seller provided directions for optimized product effectiveness, which was greatly appreciated. Plus a portion of sales goes to support an excellent cause.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Tippery

customer_reviews.title: Tub drain clogged w/ hair cleared as promised!
customer_reviews.text: Follow the directions as instructed and you should be great! My spouses tub drain was clogged and the tub would fill with water when showering. It would take a long time to drain afterwards. Used product as instructed and it worked great. Fast drain with a little whirl pool even since there was so much suction! *You can't rush this stuff. Follow the directions and it will work great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Standish

customer_reviews.title: This Product works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My guest bathroom sink and tub where clogged. I had tried several home remedies to unclog them and nothing worked. I read the reviews on here and was a little skeptical but bought product anyways. Yesterday I poured 16oz of XionLab down my sink and 16oz down the tub and left for work. When I returned I boiled 2 pots of water and poured down the drains. My sink and tub are both unclogged now. I was totally surprised. This product really works!!! My husband was so excited as we had been talking about hiring a plumber. Now we don't. Thanks XIONLAB!!!
customer_reviews.author: goldielox_ss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Worked fantastic! Had a bathroom sink drain that was, I repeat, was totally clogged. Called plumbers used snake etc. still clogged. Added half of container and let sit for 6 hrs. then filled sink again and added remainder. Let sit for 1 hr. sink drained like new. Flushed for 30 minutes because I couldn't believe it. Still free and clear!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: I found this one and it worked great! No clogged drain
customer_reviews.text: A plumber was going to charge me $100 to pour this stuff in my shower drain. After some research, I found this one and it worked great! No clogged drain. Much better for you your system (we have septic) than Liquid Plumber. I only needed 1/2 a bottle. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Larkspur

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me, but follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I used in on a tub that would take an hour to drain after a shower. I did not want to use a product that would harm our septic system, so I tried Xionlab. One bottle was enough to fix the drain. I have since ordered two more bottles for further cleansing and maintenance. TIP: Make sure to use plenty of boiling water after the 6-8 hour treatment. And you may at first think the drain is completely clogged, but give the hot water a chance to work. It worked for me!
customer_reviews.author: nook fan

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect. Had a backed up shower and left this for 2 hours (totally forgot and only meant to leave for 30) but it totally fixed our drain. I did not want to go out and buy Drano which is full of disgusting and harsh chemicals I'd have to breathe in. This did a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor - The Baby Gear LadyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: This product works wonders
customer_reviews.text: We had a super clogged bath tub drain, mostly due to hair. We tried lot of drain clear liquids but nothing worked. We tried this product as a last chance before calling a plumber. We applied this liquid for 2 consecutive nights (for about 8 hrs as advertised by the seller) and the drain is now all clear. Being organic is just a great plus for this product. We highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sagar24

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Followed directions but no good
customer_reviews.text: poured the entire bottle directly down the bathtub drain at 9pm. The next morning, boiled a huge pot of water and poured it down the bathtub drain (per directions). That evening, bath time. Tub drained just as slowly as it did every time before. The product didn't do a thing. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Great nontoxic option
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair that causes a drain clog every now and again no matter how diligent I am about cleaning the shower. This was a great option that I also felt good about using--it was fast and effective and I wasn't worrying about dumping a ton of toxins down the drain. It took care of a tough clog with half a bottle and I'll definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Another Reader

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect, the first time.
customer_reviews.text: We had a shower drain that has been slow for years. Liquid plumber hasn't worked. I poured 1/2 bottle and let it sit overnight. Next morning, I poured 2 gallons of hot water down that drain. It now drains like it's new. Couple days later I added about 1/4 bottle down that drain and let it sit overnight, just in case there was any residual blockage. I can't say it got any better after the second round, but was a good peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P.

customer_reviews.title: So Glad that it Worked
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this product. I had to treat both my bathroom sink and tub. Sure it was a hair clog. Left the product overnight and flushed the drains the next morning with boiling water. My drains are clear and water drains wonderful. It states that it's not harmful to septic systems - I truly hope not because I really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: "Worked great! Poured half the bottle in my clogged sink, waited about 7 hours, rinsed with very hot water and no more clog! My bathroom sink now works great and I am happy that this is also working in the septic tank. Thanks for a great product that works on clogs and septic tanks! Will definitely purchase again for the next clog."
customer_reviews.author: Fishn' Geekgal

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, go with a tested product like Liquid Plumber or Drano
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with product. Even following the " Special Directions " that came to me in a separate Email, I wound up having to go to the store and purchase Liquid Plumber to get the job done. I used the product in my bathtub. Mind you, I'm the only user of the tub. No long haired girls etc.. The clog shouldn't ave been that bad. Your product was a bust. Liquid plumber got the job done. An expensive lesson learned. Unhappy Consumer, Norm Sampsell, Elmira,New York
customer_reviews.author: Norman Sampsell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I used everything on my sink and nothing worked. I was going to call a plumber and decided to buy something expensive first, just in case. First run didn't do anything. I got upset, ready to make a call, but did the second run and all good. I dunno what exactly it did, but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I’ve used all of the name brands. Sometimes they work, sometimes not so great. But I wind up having to do again in a few months. It’s not a hair issue, I think it is from some of the thick conditioners. But since using this brand, my drains are still clear after several months. Was skeptical, but I followed the directions and it’s like having brand new pipes!!
customer_reviews.author: Beatnik RN

customer_reviews.title: Pretty impressed
customer_reviews.text: So my shower drain all of a sudden had a huge build up. I used half a bottle of this magical juice and let it sit overnight. The next morning I boiled two pots of hot water and poured it down the drain then left it for most of the day. When I did finally shower, I had no water build up at all whereas I usually have some sort of water build up in the tub. This served it's purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Lamar D.

customer_reviews.title: Xion drain cleaner really works!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because my condo was built in the 70s and I wanted to avoid harsh chemicals. You know what? IT WORKED GREAT! My clogged drains were as good as new in about 3 hours! I will definitely keep this on hand and will happily recommend it to others! What a good product!
customer_reviews.author: arteest

customer_reviews.title: Works great and seller is nice!
customer_reviews.text: Used it just like the directions said and whala! Sink is draining and so is the shower! I even boiled water to rinse after treatment and perfect! The seller even sent me an email to forward directions and make sure all was good with the product. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe for pipes and it works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to product to unclog & maintain the drain in my tub. It works like a charm. I do wish it was a little less expensive for the amount you get, but right now I just buy as needed and haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: K. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Great simple drain unclogging liquid
customer_reviews.text: My bathtub/shower had a clog. Although water was draining, it was far slower compared to expectation and water would accumulate during a shower. I poured the remover down the drain and continued on with my day. After several hours, I poured hot water that I recently boiled down the drain. No issues since and I am happy
customer_reviews.author: E. Chu

customer_reviews.title: To my amazement it worked
customer_reviews.text: I had to clear a basement shower that I use to shower my dog. Years of hair and dirt It took twice but it cleared it. I was skeptical due that it was biodegradable. I'll definitely get more for maintenance flushing. It's expensive but it beats buying other's that won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor O' Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders, but I might need a second bottle
customer_reviews.text: My tub was draining so slowly that when you were taking a shower it was like you were getting ready for a bath. By the time I was done the water level would have rise to my ankles, with my feet completely submerged in the water. I got this product and gave it a try, using up the entire bottle, and there was a significant improvement. The tub drains much faster now and the water level doesn't rise nearly as high. But it might be bad enough where I will need a second bottle but, for the time being, this is MUCH better. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nontoxic product that WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Virtually no smell and worked perfectly! I had a severely clogged bathroom sink, hair, etc. I poured the drain opener down the drain in the morning nd when I returned home from work it was like new again. No hair to be found and my bathroom didn't smell like noxious fumes whatsoever. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t completely unclog my drain, but amazing customer service and great company!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions, didn’t get rid of the clog. Update: owner contacted me and sent additional instructions on how to unclog my drain, it helped, but not fully unclogged. The owner sent me a full refund and an additional bottle to unclog my drain. Amazing company, very well run, thanks for great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works! Cleared Double kitchen sinks.
customer_reviews.text: I don;t know how it works, or why it works but it DOES WORK! Severely clogged kitchen sink. This alone solved the problem and No auger necessary! I have purchased an additional bottle to use in my bathtub drain. Looking forward to great results.
customer_reviews.author: L. Eldred-Lotto

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Cleared my bathtub drain with one application. Definitely the best drain opener i’ve tried. I also appreciate the fact that after I ordered it the company sent an email on how to use it (even though instructions on the container are clear). That tells me they don’t just want the sale, but want the customer to be pleased with the product. (Could have done without the “Jesus Loves You” on the label, though.)
customer_reviews.author: SueBeeBuzz

customer_reviews.title: Good product and works fine!
customer_reviews.text: There is no strong smell for this product and it works great for the bathtub drain. Just follow the instructions and there is an obvious outcome (no clog anymore)! Really easy to use. But one bottle is only for 2 uses according to the instructions I think?
customer_reviews.author: my36

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me at all
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to a T. It didn’t work at all. Tried it twice and my shower is still collecting water instead of draining it fast. Not happy considering this isnt a cheap drain opener.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderwoman

customer_reviews.title: My husband uses deodorant soap and it melts horribly, which clogs up the drain a lot
customer_reviews.text: Finally used this as the overnight version. Seems to work quite well. My husband uses deodorant soap and it melts horribly, which clogs up the drain a lot. I have one more application to go. If it continues to work as well, I'll purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: ScarletRose32333

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I used 1/2 the bottle in my shower and left it overnight for 8-10 hours, then poured 7 cups of boiling water down the drain the next AM. This was about 2 weeks ago and I haven’t had any clogging issues since. Works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Call a plumber instead of using this
customer_reviews.text: Used two applications following instructions since first application did nothing. It was for a bathroom sink drain that would drain albeit at a glacier pace. After using this product, it drains to a little faster drip. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy from Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Great product from a customer service oriented company!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is a product that is better for our pipes, but even moreso for our overall health with no harsh fumes and chemicals! Takes a little longer to work on tough hair clogs than some harsher chemical openers, but I'm okay with that if it means safer for me and my home and family! GREAT customer service! I encourage you to try this product!
customer_reviews.author: jtchristian

customer_reviews.title: Cleared the clog
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked perfectly, I poured it in the tub then let it sit overnight. And ran hot water, I couldn’t boil water and then carry it upstairs. My water is extremely hot and the water cleared from the toilet in that bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: KMMT

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as described. Stubborn clog in the tub is now gone! I wanted something less toxic than the typical drain cleaner. Coincidentally I was reading a book by Dr. Hyman (The Sugar Solution) and he referred to eliminating toxins from the body and one of the recommendations was not to use toxic household cleaners such as drain cleaners or oven cleaners which promote toxins in your body. So that led to me to the search for something less or non toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Westie Mom

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars across the board! My tub started backing up out of nowhere, I used 1.5 bottles of Liquid Plumber with no success & was beyond disgusted at that point. I'm so glad I took a chance&ordered this! I used 1 dose (bottle is clearly marked), let it sit for 7+ hrs, poured boiling water down the drain and voila, good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Malik Blassingame

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: The follow up letter for instructions on use was most helpful. those instructions should be on the bottle. (The 2hr wait verses the 8 hr. Other then that the product did just what you said it would do. Thanks! One Happy Customer Steaven
customer_reviews.author: Steaven Druschel

customer_reviews.title: It really works.  I was surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product that I could pour down my shower drain that would break up the clog of hair but would also be septic safe. I ordered this because it met those needs but I was not optimistic that it would work. I was actually making a Plan B for when it didn't work. But no need, it worked!
customer_reviews.author: K. Rolston

customer_reviews.title: Tried 'em all, this one works!
customer_reviews.text: Tried Drano, Liq Plumber, ZEP, etc...finally decided to spend the money on this Xion product and I'm glad I did! After two applications and using extremely hot water (as directed) the drain opened up and flowed liked new! I'm very pleased and will buy again to maintain the pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Big Buddha

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time doesn't do the job
customer_reviews.text: This product did nothing to help the problem of my clogged bath tub. I used it as directed, actually twice. The directions say if the product does not work the first time. Do it again which is the reminder of the bottle. I had to call a plumber that used a stronger product that worked in 10 minutes and 85.00 later not including the money I spent on XionLab ..so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: anna Lagalante

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this clog remover!!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend. This is the BEST clog remover I have ever used. No strong odor at all like the ones in stores. I will definitely buy this again. I love that it has a mark on bottle for 2 uses. Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It is soft!
customer_reviews.text: Product was great for bathroom. Wasn’t agressive and somewhat did the job. In my kitchen it didn’t work. I hate using hard product so I am avoiding it. I think this product has to be used frequently to maintain drainage so back up is not bad and take a long time to clear.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work after leaving it for hours - edit: got full refund
customer_reviews.text: At first, I poured the first half of the bottle into my shower drain, waited the 30 min it asks for, and then rinsed with hot water, as per instructions. That didn't work, so I tried the second half of the bottle, left it overnight and rinsed it in the morning, and it still didn't work. Terrible use of $20. EDIT: after posting this review, XionLab has issued me a full refund (as seen in their response to this review), so I've changed this one-star review to a 3-star, because at least it was more like a trial than a waste of money. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Works better than store bought
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product. Regular products didnt work as the issue wasnt in the pipes under the sink. It was further back where the kitchen sink and garbage diaposal meet and behind the wall. Left it in overnight amd it was clear. This was after 3 days of very slow draining/clogged drain. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: E.T

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: I have had issues for 1 year with my kitchen sink & tried everything. I saw this and am so happy as it worked great with 2 applications (1 bottle). Will buy more to keep on hand & well worth your money
customer_reviews.author: Doriadb

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My tub was consistently filling up with water while showering. I poured half a bottle of XIONLAB Safer Drain Opener down the drain and let it sit overnight. When I woke up in the morning I heated up a pot of water on the stove and poured it into the tub. This was a couple weeks ago and I've had no issues since then. This probably works similarly to other drain openers, but you can feel better knowing that it's safer for the environment. It certainly costs more, but if you're environmentally conscious, it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Morton

customer_reviews.title: Works Better Than Well-Known Brands
customer_reviews.text: I used XIONLAB drain clog remover, and it worked with only one application. A few weeks earlier I had tried a well-know brand, and it didn't give me satisfactory results. XIONLAB clearly worked better for me.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: It's not magic but like its the same as the others that are toxic
customer_reviews.text: So I use facemasks allll the time and it always clogs my drain. I used to use the generic store one but felt bad bc of all the chemicals. Well, this works the same and is free of chemicals so I'm satisfied hahaa
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Best drain cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed your product. I used it in my shower that 4 people use. The drain was pretty backed up. We had used drain hair catches and cutters and they didnt work as well as this. I put this in my drains and let it sit for 8 hours then did a flush of hot water. And it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Finally something worked
customer_reviews.text: Had a very stubborn clog in the shower and tried everything. Next step was a plumber. Read the reviews for this and figured I'd try it. It worked with just one 8hr application. (half the bottle for 8 hours then flushed with boiling water)
customer_reviews.author: Syn106

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work - keep religion off your products
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions exactly, and unfortunately, this did nothing for my shower drain. I was also unhappy that this company felt the need to make their religious preferences known on the bottle. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: Two people + long hair = Slow draining tub I got annoyed and bought several drain unclogged from the store to no avail... finally decided to try this one and it worked. I poured it at night and in the morning ran hot water over it. It looked like it didn't work at first but when we went to shower, water went right down! Pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: IGEMZ

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Cleared up a stubborn clog in bathroom sink. When I poured the hot water in, some pretty gross black stuff came up, which I wasn’t expecting. Started trying to scoop it out, which turned out not to be necessary; after a few rounds of hot water, everything just went down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: JA in NJ

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews but this product is a miracle. Our drains cannot be manually cleaned because the drain cover is fixed. This product did exactly what it says. Buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I tried it all, from natural to toxic. Nothing worked in my tub drain. This worked. I left it for about 24 hrs, poured two kettles full of boiling water. Not sure if I needed to but I wasn't going to take any chances.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cheng

customer_reviews.title: First time in 20 years I have not had to call a plumber!
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen sink. Plumber always had to get on roof to snake it because it has one of those metal covers over the drain part so a snake wont fit. Drano never worked. Poured in half the bottle - let sit for 8 hours - boiled a big ole pot of water - poured - and then turned on the water full blast. Drained all the way. I am so happy with this product, and i have tried them all...
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: WORKED without the stench of chemicals!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in two slow shower drains! Half bottle each! Both worked beautifully the next day!! No smell! No chemical stench! Probably better for the environment in our house and in the world! Will buy again! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: ccssbec

customer_reviews.title: this stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to write reviews, but I just had to for this product. This absolutely works. We had a slow drain in the bathroom sink and the bathtub (from hair). I searched and decided on this product and I'm so glad I did. I put 1/2 bottle down each drain, left overnight, boiled water in the morning and threw it in. I then ran regular hot water and it was not slow anymore! It has been a week now and still good. I am purchasing another one at my husband's request for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Probably not the products fault
customer_reviews.text: Well did not work for us ... but very nice packaging and instructions. We have had a painter in our home and I believe it’s paint chips in a bathroom sink.
customer_reviews.author: Beau M.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but does not work
customer_reviews.text: It cost more than normal drain opener, but it does not work. My drain is still clogged as before, not a little bit better
customer_reviews.author: Haidong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing! I didn’t know what to expect but I read the reviews and hoped for the best. I followed the instructions and my sinks are draining normally (much faster) again. I am so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Hulk in the Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit: I was skeptical of this product's claims. Use only a half a bottle? Didn't think it would work. You need to let that half bottle do it's thing overnight--only hours if the clog isn't shutting the flow off completely. The next day, I rinsed with almost boiling water and I was amazed how fast the sink drained. Made a believer out of me.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Pecnik

customer_reviews.title: did not work for me, had to remove trap
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately this product did not work for me, I put eggshells in the garbage disposal like I have done many times, this time put all 4 eggshells all at once, my mistake, sink backed up, used the whole bottle overnight, tried to flush it down next morning with hot water, did not do the job, had to remove the trap and flush it down on a plastic bag and plastic bin
customer_reviews.author: Cathaleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first but decided and I'd try the product and I'm so glad I did. All it took was one application and my tub is draining very well. Will use it again if necessary. Well worth the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K.

customer_reviews.title: It worked, does what it said would do
customer_reviews.text: It works well, I followed the instructions: poured half in the bathroom sink, let it sit over night, pure hot water in the 2nd day, and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Effective, Easy to use (be sure to read directions)
customer_reviews.text: Had a very slow draining tub. I applied 2 doses which makes up the whole bottle. Very conveniently line on bottle shows the dosage amount. I allowed the tub to dry for a day then slowly poured in 1 dose. Waited 8 hrs and applied 4 cups of boiled water from a gooseneck kettle (slowly). Worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: J Ham

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle worker...My tub was clogged for months...Whenever I took a shower the water would be up to my knees and it took hours to drain..I tried EVERYTHING.....Looked online for help and ran across this product..I was extremely skeptical because nothing worked..To my surprise and joy ,my tub is running beautifully...Been clogged free for two months so far..I will be ordering more to have as backup if needed..Highly recommended..
customer_reviews.author: michele bridgewater

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I had a very clogged bathroom sink drain. Nothing would unclog it. I tried Xion. Half a bottle overnight and it is clear, Will do monthly maintenance. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: DollyB

customer_reviews.title: Solved problem!!
customer_reviews.text: Used as directed, cleared my bathtub drain after one use. Was safe to use on my acrylic tub liner, and I will be ordering this again. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Directions were clear. Used the product and it cleared the slow draiin bby the morning. Will buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: nonny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have used many drain cleaners over the years and this is by far the best. If you are careful to follow the exact instructions on the bottle the product will perform without fail. Thanks so much for a very positive experience with your product. I would recommend it to anyone. I unclogged two slow running bathroom sinks with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: XIONLAB Safer Drain Clog Remover – Industrial-Strength Liquid Drain Cleaner for Hair & Grease – Septic Safe, Odorless, Biodegradable for Bathroom Sink, Bath Tub, Shower Drain – 32 oz
feature_bullets: ★ AVOID OTHER SINK DRAIN CLEANER S THAT promise results and flat out DON’T WORK OR MAKE THE PROBLEM WORSE! Xion Lab AWARD-WINNING Gel Liquid Shower Drain Cleaner was formulated with INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGY to ATTACK CLOGS AT THE ROOT. Our drain opener to clings to blockages, WITHOUT GENERATING TOXIC GASES THAT open clogs in your pipes. Our thick, heavier-than-water pipe cleaner works quickly on fats, oils, grease, soap scum, lint & hair. *Not suited for paper, plastics or food particles.

★ MOST ACID-BASED BATHROOM SINK DRAIN CLEANERS ARE VERY toxic, corrosive & damaging, with chemical ingredients HARMFUL TO YOUR PIPES, THE ENVIRONMENT & YOU. That’s why we created our proprietary cutting-edge hair clog remover for sink formula to be EFFECTIVE YET ODORLESS, NON-FLAMMABLE & BIODEGRADABLE. No sharp, burning after-smell. It truly is the GREENER, SAFER liquid drain cleaner that ACTUALLY WORKS. Our container uses post-consumer recycled plastic, further lowering our eco-footprint

★ BALANCING BETWEEN EFFECTIVENESS & SAFETY, OUR hair drain clog remover is non-corrosive & APPPROVED FOR USE ON ALL TYPES OF PIPES. So, unlike more caustic heavy duty drain clog remover, you can solve your shower tub drain clog problems without creating more damaging ones. PROFESSIONAL STRENGTH, it safely gets the job done right. Our drain clog remover IS RECOGNIZED BY THE TERRA CARE SEAL representing that it MEETS ENVIRONMENTAL SAFETY STANDARDS.

★ POWERFUL ENOUGH FOR tough clogs YET GENTLE ENOUGH FOR YOUR SEPTIC TANK. When used properly, our SEPTIC SAFE drain cleaner won’t harm the biological enzymes that keep your septic tank system running well. MUCH SAFER THAN acid drain cleaner, and MORE POWERFUL & EFFECTIVE THAN enzyme drain cleaner, Xion Lab disposal cleaner is PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA. We are a SMALL FAMILY-OWNED BUSINESS and love what we do. If, for any reason you aren’t happy, WE WILL MAKE IT RIGHT.

★ AT XION LAB, WE DON’T SPEND our money, time or energy marketing subpar drain unclogger that doesn’t truly work. Instead, WE INVEST IN CREATING innovative, cutting-edge, SAFER, CLEANER solutions to your common household problems. We believe in what we do. WE BELIVE IN CONTRIBUTING TO A CLEANER PLANET & A CLEANER BODY. That is why a percentage of each sale goes to SUPPORTING NON-PROFITS WORKING TO CURE DRUG ADDICTION.
